PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE
	{ 	?dataset dcterms:description ?desc2 }
INSERT
	{	?dataset dcterms:description ?desc1 }
WHERE
	{	?dataset a dcat:Dataset .
		?dataset dcterms:description ?desc1 .
		?dataset dcterms:description ?desc2 .
		FILTER (?desc1 != ?desc2)
	}
